free_text.Learning outcomes: This course is aimed to make use of the Mathematica program to model and analyze experimental results. Basic and advanced features of Mathematica will be demonstrated with the help on notebooks and through practical hands-on exercises using PC's.
free_text.Content: The following topics will be addressed:[br/][br/][li]Symbolic algebra, linear and non linear systems[br/][li]Differentiation[br/][li]Integration[br/][li]Solving differential equations and systems of differential equations[br/][li]Regression analysis[br/][li]Multivariate statistical analysis
free_text.Keywords: Symbolic algebra, linear systems, non linear systems, differentiation, integration, differential equations, regression analysis, multivariate statistical analysis

free_text.Contenu: The following topics will be addressed:[br/][br/][li]Symbolic algebra, linear and non linear systems[br/][li]Differentiation[br/][li]Integration[br/][li]Solving differential equations and systems of differential equations[br/][li]Regression analysis[br/][li]Multivariate statistical analysis
